name: Greenhouse Gauntlet
description:
Originally made for the 'GoGodotJam - 36' but had some issues with publishing and it seems that I didn't manage to submit to the jam itself. 

Controls: 

WASD / Arrow keys = Movement

Space bar / H = Harvest

Game:

Harvest enough food in the time limit! Every 2 seconds plants will increase their yield, up to a maximum of 3. But watch out, as 3 plants in a row (horizontal/vertical) will trigger a train reaction, reducing to 1 food and damaging your greenhouse! Make sure to harvest these as quickly as possible.
